projects.name: Hyperliquid
projects.desc: A decentralized exchange platform that recently hit a new 24h ATH of $3.4B in spot volume and introduced 'hyperps'—perpetual futures for tokens yet to launch. Upcoming HIP-3 upgrade enables permissionless perpetual markets.
projects.why_matters: A decentralized exchange platform that recently hit a new 24h ATH of $3.4B in spot volume and introduced 'hyperps'—perpetual futures for tokens yet to launch. Upcoming HIP-3 upgrade enables permissionless perpetual markets.
projects.potential_impact: If attention grows, expect improved liquidity, listings, and potential ecosystem integrations as fundamentals and narrative align.
projects.narrative_thesis: Undervalued DeFi Infrastructure play with improving fundamentals; potential rerating as narrative gains mindshare.
